lines.text: Dose dat don't help demselves just don't get no help.
A word to the wise is deficient.
Hey, get a load of this place! Looks like Shangri-La with plumbin'.
I don't mind learning the ropes so long as my head don't get caught in the noose.
You know, Father, I'm afraid that you sorta philosophied my psychology.

[butler opens door]
Hey, Mr. McCormick! We come up here on the little matter of business. We have a few little...
I am not Mr. McCormick. I am the butler.
Well, would you send McCormick down? We'd like to talk to him.
I'm sorry, Mr. McCormick is indisposed.
Well how far is that from here? Can you reach him by phone?

[interrupts the boys having a water fight just as Slip is spraying Sach in the face with seltzer]
Boys, boys, there's a lady present.
He ain't no lady!
[sees Marian]
Oh, pardon me! I'm sorry to make your acquaintance.
Well I'm sorry to make yours, too.
Better hide your silly looking face. They might recognize ya.
Are you kidding, since I grew up my mother don't even recognize me.
Who ever told ya that you grew up?
A draft board.

What's the matter with you, don't you know what happens when a man's sick in bed like that? They lock him up in a room and all day long he's inhaling air - pure h20 - and he dehales carbon monoxide. And that's where flowers come in. They condense all that carbon monoxide and then they give off pure oxygen. Course, that's what happens to you guys who won't go to school - you just won't learn nothin'.

[admiring a marble bust]
How do ya like this - real marble.
Musta taken a lot of marbles to make dat.
